channel.title: Item On Item. Errors

item.title: Item On Item. Errors
item.dc:creator: @Niceneasypk Niceneasypk
item.description:
@Niceneasypk wrote:

Mkay… Im not brilliant with Item on Item or Item on Object coding… I can make it work though, but its not something i can just get right within the first 20 times lol.
Anyway… i was reading through a tut on Item on Item, and attempted it… I did exactly as the tut said, and ended up with this code:

} else if(useItemID == 985 && atItemID == 987) { deleteItem(985, getItemSlot(989), 1); deleteItem(987); sendMessage("You add the two pieces together and get a nice bonus."); }
As a newb… I know theres something wrong with the deleteItem(987) bit. The Idea was that you add the crystal key pieces together to form the full crystal key. I get errors from what’re usually problems with the “atItemID” or “atObjectID” in particular, and could do with a bit of help as for if theres anything wrong with them, but the errors i got in this case were:

[code]client.java:16540:cannot find symbol
symbol : variable atItemID
location: class client
else if(useItemID == 985 && atItemID == 987) {

client.java:16542: deleteItem(int,int,int) in client cannot be applied to (int)
deleteItem(987); [/code]

The places where the arrows are pointing to showing which are causing the errors somehow are inbetween the "**"s… Im not that stupid
Thanks ,
Niceneasypk

Read full topic
